title: Update organization name to Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee, Maharajganj Jaunpur

requirements.text: Update all instances of the organization name and location across the website to read 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee, Maharajganj, Jaunpur'. This includes the page title in index.html, the Header component (logo/name display), HeroSection tagline/title, AboutSection, ContactSection address, DonateSection, and any other component that references the organization name or location.

quotes:
मस्जिद ए गौसिया वेलफेयर कमिटी
महराजगंज जौनपुर करे

acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab title shows 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee'
The Header displays 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee' as the organization name
The location 'Maharajganj, Jaunpur' appears in the contact/address section
All sections consistently reference the correct organization name and location
Hindi text for the name reads 'मस्जिद ए गौसिया वेलफेयर कमिटी' and location reads 'महराजगंज, जौनपुर' where Hindi is used

constraints: Do not alter the Islamic visual theme (deep green, gold, cream color palette)
Do not change any backend data models or CRUD logic
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (hooks, main.tsx, ui components)
nonGoals: Changing the website language or layout
Modifying backend announcement or contact inquiry logic
